description: Golden, crispy chicken schnitzel served with chunky creamed corn and crisp greens will become a family favourite. The best bit? It'll be ready in 25 minutes.
keywords: Chicken Schnitzels With Homemade Creamed Corn
name: Chicken Schnitzels With Homemade Creamed Corn Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a medium saucepan of water to the boil over high. Cook broccolini for 3 minutes or until tender. Drain. Divide creamed corn among plates. Top with chicken, broccolini, spinach and lemon. Serve seasoned with pepper.
